textContent:
---first dates---

Our first date is only a few dates away!! I've looked forward to this date for weeks now!! I've longed for the where I could finally spend time with you! I wonder what you would wear that day? I'm sure it would look good on you (ikaw pa ba)! By the time you're reading this, I hope I've made you smile lots of times already! (At sana di kita nabuhusan ng kape kase my clumsy self is too excited).

I've always liked idea of first dates. You don't know what to expect. There's always this excitement and wonder when it comes to first dates, which then usually subsides afterwards. Which is why when it comes to first dates, I always give my best. Because you don't know if there'll be a second.

But I feel like with you, Rei, the feeling of enchantment and wonder and interest that I get with first dates wouldn't disappear. Pakiramdam ko sayo, hindi mawawala yung kaba, yung bilis sa pag pintig ng puso, yung kagustuhan magmukhang desente para lang maantig ka, kahit na naka ilang dates na tayo.

You'll read this letter at our first date, Rei. It won't be the last.
title: January 17, 2024

---first dates---


Our first date is only a few dates away!! I've looked forward to this date for weeks now!! I've longed for the where I could finally spend time with you! I wonder what you would wear that day? I'm sure it would look good on you (ikaw pa ba)! By the time you're reading this, I hope I've made you smile lots of times already! (At sana di kita nabuhusan ng kape kase my clumsy self is too excited).


I've always liked idea of first dates. You don't know what to expect. There's always this excitement and wonder when it comes to first dates, which then usually subsides afterwards. Which is why when it comes to first dates, I always give my best. Because you don't know if there'll be a second.


But I feel like with you, Rei, the feeling of enchantment and wonder and interest that I get with first dates wouldn't disappear. You'll read this letter at our first date, Rei. It won't be the last.
